content:
# Timeblock

## v1

This timeblock is extremely optimistic that I won’t burn out from doing outreach all day, but I’d like to give it a shot

```plain text
6:30 - 7:30   | Morning Routine
7:30 - 9:00   | Finish Dialect Outreach on Facebook (respond to all messages and send more)
9:00 - 10:00  | Finish Dialect Outreach on Linkedin (respond to all messages)
10:00 - 12:00 | Polish up the blog page (add home page link and also make the call to action more clear by describing what Dialect does)
12:00 - 12:45 | RV1 Meeting
12:00 - 13:00 | Startup School Meeting
13:00 - 13:30 | Founder Social
13:30 - 22:30 | Continue trying to outreach on StackOverflow/Discord servers by answering people's questions
22:30 - 23:30 | Evening Routine
```

## v2

Had to answer a help request from a Dialect user

```plain text
6:30 - 8:00 | Helping user on Dialect
8:00 - 9:10 | Gym
9:10 - 9:20 | Continuing to help user
...
```

(didn’t end up tracking what I did; but I worked on Dialect (coding + outreach) for the whole day; couldn’t get myself to do outreach for the entire day lol)

# Routines

## Morning

```plain text
6:30 - 6:45 | Wake up, brush teeth, bike to gym
6:45 - 7:15 | Gym
7:15 - 7:25 | Bike home
7:25 - 7:30 | Quick Shower
```

## Evening

```plain text
22:30 - 22:40 | Prepare gym bag & clothes for tomorrow, create next day’s daily timeblock; brush teeth
22:40 - 23:00 | Writing Practice
23:00 - 23:20 | Reading
23:20 - 23:30 | Sleep
```
